Fungal Forager.background_description: You follow the whisperings of the deep earth, the rhythmic pulse of the mycelium forest that grows beneath the surface. The dark holds no terror for you. Also, you really love mushrooms.

table1.question: What strange fungus did you discover?

options.description: Shrieking Trumpet. When exposed to light, it screams so loudly that all nearby attacks (including your own) are impaired. 2 uses.

items.name: Shrieking Trumpet
items.description: When exposed to light, it screams so loudly that all nearby attacks (including your own) are impaired.

options.description: Torch Fungus. When crushed, it creates a cold blue light for a short while. 2 uses.

items.name: Torch Fungus
items.description: When crushed, it creates a heatless light for ten minutes.

options.description: Murderous Truffle. Pungent, highly toxic, and very rare (worth 50gp to assassins). Illegal pretty much everywhere. 1 use.

items.name: Murderous Truffle
items.description: Pungent, highly toxic, and very rare (worth 50gp to assassins). Illegal pretty much everywhere.

options.description: Hellcap. Exposure to its aroma causes intense nausea and vomiting. Either way, it clears the room. Bottled. 1 use.

items.name: Hellcap
items.description: Exposure to its aroma causes intense nausea and vomiting. Either way, it clears the room. Bottled.

options.description: Sproutcup. Ingest to shrink down to the size of a mouse. (Your belongings stay the same size.) You return to normal size within the hour, often in fits and starts. 1 use.

items.name: Sproutcup
items.description: Ingest to shrink down to the size of a mouse. (Your belongings stay the same size.) You return to normal size within the hour, often in fits and starts.

options.description: Rootflower. A white fungus found only on corpses deep underground. Ingest to restore d6 WIL. You will dream of the dead and their stories. 1 use.

items.name: Rootflower
items.description: A white fungus found only on corpses deep underground. Ingest to restore d6 WIL. You will dream of the dead and their stories.

table2.question: What keeps you sane, even in utter darkness?

options.description: Glowsnail. Casts a soft, bioluminescent light. Feeds on one ration every two days.

items.name: Glowsnail
items.description: Casts a soft, bioluminescent light. Feeds on one ration every two days.

options.description: Silk Moth Shawl. A weatherproof blanket, it can also douse a fire without being damaged.

items.name: Silk Moth Shawl
items.description: A weatherproof blanket, it can also douse a fire without being damaged.

options.description: Milkflower. A gentle stimulant. Chewing it makes you immune to panic for the next hour. 3 uses.

items.name: Milkflower
items.description: A gentle stimulant. Chewing it makes you immune to panic for the next hour.

options.description: Luxcompass. Hums softly as it moves closer to the Sun. Eventually the noise becomes unbearably loud.

items.name: Luxcompass
items.description: Hums softly as it moves closer to the Sun. Eventually the noise becomes unbearably loud.

options.description: Sloth-Tarp. A tough and weatherproof fabric, useful for hanging off trees. When inside, you have +1 Armor.

items.name: Sloth-Tarp
items.description: A tough and weatherproof fabric, useful for hanging off trees. When inside, you have +1 Armor.

options.description: Miner's Grease. Great for dislodging a gem, tool, or limb from a tight crack. Highly explosive. 3 uses.

items.name: Miner's Grease
items.description: Great for dislodging a gem, tool, or limb from a tight crack. Highly explosive.
